name: Kid and the Muffin Madness: Reheated
name_original: Kid and the Muffin Madness: Reheated
description:
For 5 years of kid I wanted to you that yes,

a remake of the small high school kid game is coming, Kid and the Muffin Madness: reheated

I hope to continue development soon so, download and see what I have now, I hope you enjoy it!
